text: Hi team! I am trying to send a test email to myself from a workflow, but noticing soft bounce and not receiving it. However when I click "Send test email" from email itself, I am able to receive it. What could be the possible reason for this issue! Can someone please help me here!
Are you enrolling yourself in the workflow or just clicking the test button and choosing your contact

Hi Carter, That you so much for looking into this! Actually my workflow certain attributes from  a custom object for enrolment criteria. I am not a part of the custom object. But I have been added as an association to one of the custom object profile.
Ah very nice, and are you testing by clicking the test button and selecting the custom object or by directly enrolling this object?

Yes, I am testing by clicking the test button > selecting the profile from the custom object in the dropdown with which I am associated > then checking the option " Send me the HubSpot email this workflow would deliver". Still I am not receiving any test emails
Do you possibly want to test by just directly enrolling the object, I've noticed that sometimes behaves differently
Sorry, which object?
Just enroll the custom object that is associated to your contact record
I see, Do you mean, Instead of enrolling the test profile via the enrolment trigger criteria for the custom Object, should I directly enrol the test profile by clicking the enroll button?
yep
I just did that and click the test button. However when I go to my profile and check under "Contacts" > Activity. I see this message.
Do you possibly want to create another contact and test it? you can send to the same email by just adding +test before the @
I see! Let me quickly try that.
Still didn't receive the test emails.
Very strange, have you unsubscribed before? or blocked the HubSpot email address?
is your inbox possibly full?
Well, I am pretty sure, It is not. Yet I have deleted a good no. of messages! Should I try resnding one more time?
it definitely can't hurt
No, still no luck.
do you possibly want to try with my email, i'll dm you it
Hi Carter! I was able to fix this issue! It was the from address in the email setting that was specific to my manager, because of which she kept receiving the test emails and I did not!
I really appreciate your time! Thank you so much!
Ah nice work, glad it's working
